mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed SET user_id = #{userId}, district_id = #{districtId}, title = #{title}, cafe_name = #{cafeName}, content = #{content}
mapper.select: SELECT A.feed_id AS feedId, A.title, B.nickname, DATE(A.created_at) AS createdAt, A.view_count AS viewCount, COUNT(C.feed_id) AS feedLike FROM feed A INNER JOIN `user` B ON A.user_id = B.user_id LEFT JOIN likes C ON A.feed_id = C.feed_id GROUP BY A.feed_id, title, nickname, DATE(A.created_at), view_count
